name: IF - Underfell
description:
Interactive Fiction of Underfell, a fan made game.

Play as a customizable "Frisk" who has accidentally (or maybe not so accidentally?) fallen into a mountain and can't escape. 

Befriend monsters! Solve puzzles! Smooch a skeleton! Die! A lot!

Most importantly, have fun interacting with these beloved characters. 

Underfell AU was created by Vic the Underfella and is based off of Toby Fox's Undertale. This is a work of essentially choose your own adventure fanfiction. 

I just really, really wanted to play the game and I feel like it'll never happen unless I make it myself. This is a PACIFIST only game for now. I don't have the heart for genocide, sorry.
